DOC.brief_summary: A feasibility trial to evaluate the usefulness of a high efficiency camera (D-SPECT) as an imaging modality for general nuclear medicine applications such as oncology.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Compare a Fast Gama Camera for Nuclear Imaging to Conventional Camera
DOC.criteria: 1. Patient is referred to nuclear medicine department for a SPECT scan. 2. Written informed consent is obtained by a study investigator. 1. Patient pregnancy (known or suspected). 2. Lack of written informed consent 3. Prisoner status 4. Patient under age 18 or over 80 years old.
